name: Ginger Tequila Twister
preparation: In a shaker filled with ice, combine the tequila, lime juice, and Campari. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with ginger beer and stir gently to combine.
backstory: Designed for those who appreciate a strong and slightly bitter cocktail, the Ginger Tequila Twister celebrates the bold flavors of tequila and ginger beer, with a bitter twist provided by Campari, echoing the complexity of modern cocktail preferences.
